verses.esv: 12:1 Therefore, since we are surrounded by so great a cloud of witnesses, let us also lay aside every weight, and sin which clings so closely, and let us run with endurance the race that is set before us,
verses.kjv: 1 Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses, let us lay aside every weight, and the sin which doth so easily beset us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us,
verses.niv: 1 Therefore, since we are surrounded by such a great cloud of witnesses, let us throw off everything that hinders and the sin that so easily entangles, and let us run with perseverance the race marked out for us.

verses.esv: 17 Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come.
verses.kjv: 17 Therefore if any man be in Christ, he is a new creature: old things are passed away; behold, all things are become new.
verses.niv: 17 Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation; the old has gone, the new has come!

verses.esv: 11 For I know the plans I have for you, declares the LORD, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope.
verses.kjv: 11 For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.
verses.niv: 11 For I know the plans I have for you," declares the LORD, "plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.

verses.esv: 6 And without faith it is impossible to please him, for whoever would draw near to God must believe that he exists and that he rewards those who seek him.
verses.kjv: 6 But without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.
verses.niv: 6 And without faith it is impossible to please God, because anyone who comes to him must believe that he exists and that he rewards those who earnestly seek him.

verses.esv: 5:1 For freedom Christ has set us free; stand firm therefore, and do not submit again to a yoke of slavery.
verses.kjv: 1 Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage.
verses.niv: 1 It is for freedom that Christ has set us free. Stand firm, then, and do not let yourselves be burdened again by a yoke of slavery.

verses.esv:
18   “Remember not the former things,
    nor consider the things of old.
19   Behold, I am doing a new thing;
    now it springs forth, do you not perceive it?
  I will make a way in the wilderness
    and rivers in the desert.
verses.kjv: 18 Remember ye not the former things, neither consider the things of old. 19 Behold, I will do a new thing; now it shall spring forth; shall ye not know it? I will even make a way in the wilderness, and rivers in the desert.
verses.niv: 18 "Forget the former things; do not dwell on the past. 19 See, I am doing a new thing! Now it springs up; do you not perceive it? I am making a way in the desert and streams in the wasteland.

verses.esv: 37 All that the Father gives me will come to me, and whoever comes to me I will never cast out.
verses.kjv: 37 All that the Father giveth me shall come to me; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out.
verses.niv: 37 All that the Father gives me will come to me, and whoever comes to me I will never drive away.

verses.esv: 12 Let not sin therefore reign in your mortal body, to make you obey its passions.
verses.kjv: 12 Let not sin therefore reign in your mortal body, that ye should obey it in the lusts thereof.
verses.niv: 12 Therefore do not let sin reign in your mortal body so that you obey its evil desires.

verses.esv: 1:1 In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
verses.kjv: 1 In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
verses.niv: 1 In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.

verses.esv:
19   Behold, I am doing a new thing;
    now it springs forth, do you not perceive it?
  I will make a way in the wilderness
    and rivers in the desert.
verses.kjv: 19 Behold, I will do a new thing; now it shall spring forth; shall ye not know it? I will even make a way in the wilderness, and rivers in the desert.
verses.niv: 19 See, I am doing a new thing! Now it springs up; do you not perceive it? I am making a way in the desert and streams in the wasteland.

verses.esv: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
verses.kjv: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
verses.niv: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness.

verses.esv: 8 For by grace you have been saved through faith. And this is not your own doing; it is the gift of God,
verses.kjv: 8 For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God:
verses.niv: 8 For it is by grace you have been saved, through faith--and this not from yourselves, it is the gift of God--

verses.esv: 9 Have I not commanded you? Be strong and courageous. Do not be frightened, and do not be dismayed, for the LORD your God is with you wherever you go.”
verses.kjv: 9 Have not I commanded thee? Be strong and of a good courage; be not afraid, neither be thou dismayed: for the LORD thy God is with thee whithersoever thou goest.
verses.niv: 9 Have I not commanded you? Be strong and courageous. Do not be terrified; do not be discouraged, for the LORD your God will be with you wherever you go."

verses.esv: 16 Therefore, confess your sins to one another and pray for one another, that you may be healed. The prayer of a righteous person has great power as it is working.
verses.kjv: 16 Confess your faults one to another, and pray one for another, that ye may be healed. The effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much.
verses.niv: 16 Therefore confess your sins to each other and pray for each other so that you may be healed. The prayer of a righteous man is powerful and effective.

verses.esv: 23 For the wages of sin is death, but the free gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.
verses.kjv: 23 For the wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.
verses.niv: 23 For the wages of sin is death, but the gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.

verses.esv: 7 In him we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of our trespasses, according to the riches of his grace,
verses.kjv: 7 In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace;
verses.niv: 7 In him we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, in accordance with the riches of God's grace

verses.esv: 13 I can do all things through him who strengthens me.
verses.kjv: 13 I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
verses.niv: 13 I can do everything through him who gives me strength.

verses.esv: 12 But to all who did receive him, who believed in his name, he gave the right to become children of God,
verses.kjv: 12 But as many as received him, to them gave he power to become the sons of God, even to them that believe on his name:
verses.niv: 12 Yet to all who received him, to those who believed in his name, he gave the right to become children of God--

verses.esv: 13 Brothers, I do not consider that I have made it my own. But one thing I do: forgetting what lies behind and straining forward to what lies ahead, 14 I press on toward the goal for the prize of the upward call of God in Christ Jesus.
verses.kjv: 13 Brethren, I count not myself to have apprehended: but this one thing I do, forgetting those things which are behind, and reaching forth unto those things which are before, 14 I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.
verses.niv: 13 Brothers, I do not consider myself yet to have taken hold of it. But one thing I do: Forgetting what is behind and straining toward what is ahead, 14 I press on toward the goal to win the prize for which God has called me heavenward in Christ Jesus.

verses.esv: 4 He will wipe away every tear from their eyes, and death shall be no more, neither shall there be mourning, nor crying, nor pain anymore, for the former things have passed away.”
verses.kjv: 4 And God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow, nor crying, neither shall there be any more pain: for the former things are passed away.
verses.niv: 4 He will wipe every tear from their eyes. There will be no more death or mourning or crying or pain, for the old order of things has passed away."

verses.esv: 20 I have been crucified with Christ. It is no longer I who live, but Christ who lives in me. And the life I now live in the flesh I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.
verses.kjv: 20 I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.
verses.niv: 20 I have been crucified with Christ and I no longer live, but Christ lives in me. The life I live in the body, I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.

verses.esv:
10   fear not, for I am with you;
    be not dismayed, for I am your God;
  I will strengthen you, I will help you,
    I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
verses.kjv: 10 Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.
verses.niv: 10 So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.

verses.esv: 16 “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
verses.kjv: 16 For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
verses.niv: 16 "For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

verses.esv: 23 for all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God,
verses.kjv: 23 For all have sinned, and come short of the glory of God;
verses.niv: 23 for all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God,

verses.esv:
5   For his anger is but for a moment,
    and his favor is for a lifetime.
  Weeping may tarry for the night,
    but joy comes with the morning.
verses.kjv: 5 For his anger endureth but a moment; in his favour is life: weeping may endure for a night, but joy cometh in the morning.
verses.niv: 5 For his anger lasts only a moment, but his favor lasts a lifetime; weeping may remain for a night, but rejoicing comes in the morning.
